fields.rule: Roll CRISIS. -1 for every different genre in the band.
fields.title: Creative Differences

fields.rule: Lose one {{REPERTOIRE}} and one {{CRED}} or roll CRISIS unless you have a {{MOGUL}} in the band.
fields.title: Not THAT One Again!

fields.rule: Ignore all [[CREATIVITY|NEG]] and get +1 to every roll for each [[CREATIVITY|POS]].
fields.title: Producer

fields.rule: Pay 1{{MONEY}} per point to improve any RECORD roll for all your bands this round.
fields.title: Company Studio

fields.rule: Roll CRISIS. -1 for every [[POS]][[NEG]] pairing of the same aspect in the band.
fields.title: Personality Clash

fields.rule: Roll CRISIS. -1 for every TOUR played if there is no {{VAGABOND}}.
fields.title: Homesick

fields.rule: Roll CRISIS. -1 for every RECORD played if you have at least one {{VAGABOND}}.
fields.title: Restless

fields.rule: Roll CRISIS. -1 for every {{LOUDMOUTH}} in the band.
fields.title: Shut Up!

fields.rule: Roll twice and pick the best on all TOURS for the band. {{STRUGGLE}} penalties are reduced by 1.
fields.title: Tour Manager

fields.rule: Ignore all [[CHARISMA|NEG]] and get +1 for each [[CHARISMA|POS]]  to SHOW rolls.
fields.title: Stage Production

fields.interrupt: Roll TROUBLE for a RECORDING band. No {{CRED}} loss if the band has a {{CLOWN}}.
fields.title: Cabin Fever

fields.rule: Play a BUYOUT on a band adding their [[SAFETY|POS]][[SAFETY|NEG]] balance.
fields.title: Making a deal

fields.rule: Play a BUYOUT on a band adding their [[PEACE|POS]][[PEACE|NEG]] balance.
fields.title: Divide and Conquer

fields.rule: Play a BUYOUT on a band with negative {{CRED}}. -1{{MONEY}} per negative {{CRED}} point, -2{{MONEY}} if there is a {{CLOWN}}.
fields.title: Rock'n'Roll Swindlers

fields.rule: Play a BUYOUT if you have a band with higher basic earnings than the one you want to buy.
fields.title: Money Talks

fields.rule: Play a BUYOUT if you have a band with more {{FAME}} than the one you want to buy.
fields.title: Burning Ambition

fields.rule: The band never gains {{STRUGGLE}} for any reason for this round.
fields.title: Loving Fans

fields.rule: Block the band for the round and roll TROUBLE. Also +1 to positive {{CRED}} or -1 to negative {{CRED}} if there is a {{LOUDMOUTH}} in the band.
fields.title: Concerned Parents

fields.interrupt: Roll TROUBLE for a TOURING band. No {{CRED}} loss if the band has a {{CLOWN}}.
fields.title: Road Rage

fields.rule: Roll TROUBLE for the band. At the end of the round, earn -1{{MONEY}} per {{CLOWN}} and {{VAGABOND}}.
fields.title: Party Hard

fields.rule: Double the effect of every [[NEG]] aspects for the round.
fields.title: Sycophants

fields.rule: Choose a style. All bands with this style earn +1{{FAME}} for every 2 of them (round up) that TOURED (no support) this round. All others lose the same in {{CRED}}.
fields.title: The Scene

fields.rule: Take an artist off their own band for one round. At the end of the round gain half the band's basic earnings; if the band was inactive, they still get half their earnings.
fields.title: Solo Flight

fields.rule: {{CRED}}: +1 for every {{AUTEUR}} {{VAGABOND}} {{SENTIMENTAL}} and -1 for every {{MOGUL}} {{HEARTTHROB}} {{LOUDMOUTH}}.
fields.title: Behind the Music

fields.rule: Gain +1{{CRED}} for every RECORDING played this round (not as GUEST).
fields.title: Release Party

fields.interrupt: Play on a TOURING band. Remove 1{{STRUGGLE}} for each {{FAME}} gained when you roll (or add if you lose).
fields.title: It's Good To Be King

fields.rule: {{CRED}}: +1 for every {{MOGUL}} {{AUTEUR}} {{VIRTUOSO}} and -1 for every {{CLOWN}} {{LOUDMOUTH}} {{HEARTTHROB}}.
fields.title: Pros and Cons

fields.interrupt: Play on a TOURING band. Roll TROUBLE adding [[PEACE|POS]][[PEACE|NEG]] modifiers. +1{{FAME}} but cannot tour or support anymore this round.
fields.title: Riots!

fields.interrupt: Play on a RECORDING band. Remove 1{{STRUGGLE}} for each {{REPERTOIRE}} gained when you roll.
fields.title: Letting It Out

fields.rule: Gain {{CRED}} according to your [[CHARISMA|POS]][[CHARISMA|NEG]] balance. Double effect if you have a {{HEARTTHROB}}.
fields.title: Meet & Greet

fields.rule: Gain {{CRED}} according to your [[PEACE|POS]][[PEACE|NEG]] balance. Double effect if you have a {{LOUDMOUTH}}.
fields.title: Some Kind of Monster

fields.interrupt: If there is a {{HEARTTHROB}}, double the effect of a TOUR but block the headlining band for the round and gain +1{{STRUGGLE}}.
fields.title: Hysteria

fields.rule: Earn +1{{MONEY}} per {{FAME}} point now. Lose the same in {{CRED}}  but double the {{MONEY}} bonus if you have a {{MOGUL}}.
fields.title: Kiss My Coffers

fields.interrupt: If there is a {{AUTEUR}}, double the effect of a RECORD but block the recording band for the round and gain +1{{STRUGGLE}}.
fields.title: Magnus Opus

fields.interrupt: Play on a RECORDING band. Roll TROUBLE -1 per {{VAGABOND}} and {{CLOWN}} (but remove 1{{STRUGGLE}} for each). Cannot record or guest anymore this round.
fields.title: Wrecking Balls

fields.rule: If you have less {{FAME}} than {{REPERTOIRE}}, gain +1{{CRED}} for every point of difference.
fields.title: Word of Mouth

fields.rule_custom: +1 for each [[SAFETY|NEG]], -1 for each [[SAFETY|POS]]. Main band gains 1{{STRUGGLE}}.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} join a recording band as GUEST.
fields.title: DECADENCE TALES

fields.rule_custom: Each label can send a band as SUPPORT. +1 per [[PEACE|NEG]] and {{LOUDMOUTH}}. Best score gains +1{{FAME}} +1{{CRED}}, all others +1{{STRUGGLE}}.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: BATTLE OF THE BANDS

fields.rule_custom: {{FAME}} effect applies to {{CRED}} too. Reroll if you have a {{VIRTUOSO}} or a {{AUTEUR}}.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: THE ORCHESTRA

fields.rule_custom: +1 for each [[PEACE|NEG]], -1 for each [[PEACE|POS]]. Main band gains 1{{STRUGGLE}}.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} join a recording band as GUEST.
fields.title: THE ANGRY ONES

fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} join a recording band as GUEST.
fields.title: FAN CLUB EP

fields.rule_custom: +1 for each {{AUTEUR}} or {{VIRTUOSO}} in the bands involved, reroll if you have both.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} join a recording band as GUEST.
fields.title: THE EPIC SUITE

fields.rule_custom: Double all [[CHARISMA|POS]] and ignore any [[CHARISMA|NEG]], but roll TROUBLE if the band has a {{CLOWN}}.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: STAGE THEATRICS

fields.rule_custom: All bands involved: -1{{CRED}} if you have any {{HEARTTHROB}} or {{CLOWN}}, but +1 to your SHOW roll for each of them. Reroll if you have both.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: LIVE BROADCAST

fields.rule_custom: {{FAME}} changes apply to both {{REPERTOIRE}} and {{MONEY}} too.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: LIVE ALBUM

fields.rule_custom: Choose one of the GENRES in the band. Every label can send one band with that GENRE to play as SUPPORT.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: FESTIVAL

fields.rule_custom: Reroll and keep the best if you have a {{AUTEUR}}.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} join a recording band as GUEST.
fields.title: CONCEPT ALBUM

fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} join a recording band as GUEST.
fields.title: COVERS

fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: BENEFIT

fields.rule_custom: Every band in the tour earns +1 {{CRED}} for every {{VIRTUOSO}} between them.
fields.rule_base: Go on TOUR or {{INTERRUPT}} SUPPORT a touring band.
fields.title: THE JAM

fields.rule_custom: If you have a {{MOGUL}}, get -1{{CRED}} but what you earn in {{REPERTOIRE}} you also get as {{MONEY}} and {{FAME}}.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} join a recording band as GUEST.
fields.title: QUICK HIT

fields.rule_custom: Reroll and keep the best if you have a {{SENTIMENTAL}}.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} join a recording band as GUEST.
fields.title: POWER BALLADS

fields.rule_custom: Choose one of the GENRES in the band. Every label can send one band with that GENRE to play as GUEST.
fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} join a recording band as GUEST.
fields.title: COMPILATION

fields.rule_base: RECORD new music or {{INTERRUPT}} join a recording band as GUEST.
fields.title: SOUNDTRACK
